overview_of_class: Argumentation is the study of effective reasoning. It considers how people give reasons to justify their acts, beliefs, attitudes, and values and to influence the thought and action of others. This course explores how to analyze and evaluate arguments as well as how to construct and challenge arguments in interpersonal settings, in the public forum, and in the mass media.
name: Theories of Argumentation
title: SCS COMM_ST 220-CN-62 Theories of Argumentation
